thread.section_title: Motorama Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Motorama | motorama.com.au
thread.title: Noel & Glenda Hutchison
thread.title_full: Motorama reviewed by Noel & Glenda Hutchison

author: Noel & Glenda Hutchison
title: Noel & Glenda Hutchison
text: We have bought 4 cars from the team at Motorama City Holden Moorooka over the years and every time have had the best service you could ever imagined. The team are not just sales people selling cars, we now consider them very good friends. If you are looking to buy a new Holden than I suggest you talk to them. They will never put you under any pressure to buy. I cannot speak more highly about this team.
